title: Tuohy Bailey & Moore LLP
subtitle: Rebrand & Website Revitalization
bullets: Complete rebrand including logo, color palette, and typography
Professional website redesign for enhanced credibility
Trust-focused visual system for competitive positioning
Scalable brand identity across digital and print applications
challenge: Outdated branding undermined credibility in a trust-driven legal market. The firm needed to establish authority while standing out from conservative competitors.
reasoning: Applied trust signaling theory — design aesthetics directly influence perceived professionalism. In legal services, first impressions determine client confidence.
execution: Full rebrand (logo, color palette, typography)
Website redesign for clarity and responsiveness
Improved visual trust cues (photography, layout)
Professional color palette with mustard gold accent
Custom typography balancing tradition with readability
results: Stronger client confidence, more inquiries, and improved competitive positioning in the Indianapolis legal market.
measurement: Enhanced brand recognition in target market
Improved client retention through trust signaling
takeaway: In professional services, branding is credibility. Visual authority translates directly to business development success.

title: 317 BBQ
subtitle: Visual Storytelling & Experience Design
bullets: Menu-first website design with ordering focus
Enhanced catering and online ordering systems
challenge: Great food but weak digital presence; visuals weren't selling the experience. The restaurant needed to convert online visitors to customers.
reasoning: Applied appetite appeal theory — people eat with their eyes first. Visual storytelling drives restaurant sales more than any other factor.
execution: Immersive photography & videography showcasing food quality
Website redesign with menu-first UX
Content structured for catering and online orders
Visual hierarchy emphasizing signature dishes
Mobile-optimized ordering experience
results: Increased engagement, more online orders, and stronger restaurant identity in competitive BBQ market.
takeaway: For restaurants, visual storytelling equals sales. High-quality food imagery and user experience design directly impact revenue.

title: PrimaryCare Indy
subtitle: Healthcare Digital Transformation
bullets: Patient-focused website design and user experience
Mobile-first responsive design for patient accessibility
challenge: Primary care practice needed modern digital presence to compete with large healthcare systems while maintaining personal touch.
reasoning: Healthcare consumers expect convenience and transparency. Digital-first approach builds trust while streamlining operations.
execution: Built responsive WordPress website with patient portal integration
Implemented online appointment scheduling system
Created patient education content library
Designed mobile-optimized experience for all demographics
Integrated with existing practice management software
results: Improved patient acquisition and retention through enhanced digital experience and operational efficiency.
takeaway: Healthcare digital transformation requires balancing technology with human connection. Convenience drives patient loyalty.

title: UrgentCare Indy
subtitle: Urgent Care Digital Strategy
challenge: Urgent care needed to differentiate from competitors while addressing patient's primary concern: wait times and accessibility.
reasoning: Urgent care success depends on convenience and speed. Digital solutions that reduce friction drive patient volume.
execution: Developed real-time wait time tracking system
Implemented online check-in functionality
Created location-specific service pages
Built mobile-first responsive design
Integrated Google Ads for local search dominance
results: Reduced patient wait times, increased volume, and improved patient satisfaction through digital innovation.
measurement: Online check-ins account for 60% of visits
Local search rankings improved to top 3
takeaway: In urgent care, time is everything. Digital solutions that save time create competitive advantage and patient loyalty.

title: Hoosier Boy Barbershop
subtitle: Traditional Barbershop Modern Marketing
bullets: Social media strategy showcasing barber skills
Online appointment system for busy professionals
Local SEO optimization for neighborhood discovery
challenge: Traditional barbershop needed modern marketing approach while maintaining authentic, old-school brand personality.
reasoning: Modern customers expect convenience, but barbershops sell tradition. Balance innovation with authenticity to attract all demographics.
execution: Created authentic brand identity honoring barbershop tradition
Developed online booking system for appointment management
Built social media strategy showcasing craftsmanship
Implemented local SEO for neighborhood dominance
Designed website reflecting shop's personality and services
results: Increased bookings while preserving traditional barbershop culture, attracting both traditional and modern clientele.
measurement: Local search rankings achieved top position
takeaway: Authenticity and convenience can coexist. Honor tradition while embracing tools that serve customers better.

title: Ayres Mechanical, Inc.
subtitle: HVAC Industry Digital Leadership
bullets: Service area optimization for local search
challenge: HVAC company needed professional digital presence to compete against larger franchises while highlighting local expertise.
reasoning: HVAC services are trust-based purchases. Professional presentation and local credibility drive customer decisions.
execution: Designed professional logo and brand identity system
Built responsive website with service area focus
Implemented emergency service request system
Created customer education content library
Optimized for local HVAC-related searches
results: Established market leadership in heating and air conditioning services through professional digital presence.
takeaway: In service industries, professional presentation equals customer confidence. Digital credibility translates to business growth.

title: Russell Painting Company
subtitle: Residential & Commercial Painting Excellence
challenge: Painting contractor needed to differentiate quality work from low-cost competitors while serving both residential and commercial markets.
reasoning: Visual proof of quality work sells painting services. Professional presentation builds trust for higher-value projects.
execution: Created comprehensive project gallery with before/after photos
Built separate service pages for residential and commercial
Implemented free estimate request system
Developed testimonial and review showcase
Optimized for local painting contractor searches
results: Positioned as premium painting contractor with steady flow of qualified leads for both residential and commercial projects.
takeaway: In contracting, quality work sells itself when properly showcased. Visual evidence and testimonials build premium positioning.

title: Graston Technique®
subtitle: Full-Stack Marketing & Systems Transformation
bullets: LMS integration with seamless data flow
challenge: National healthcare training leader needed to modernize training platform and support systems to scale operations efficiently while maintaining quality education standards.
reasoning: Technology transformation enables scalable growth. Automation and AI reduce operational burden while improving student experience.
execution: Designed and developed custom React-based training dashboard
Implemented AI-powered support chatbot system
Built 400+ automated CRM workflows for engagement
Created comprehensive LMS integration with FluentCRM
Developed checkout optimization increasing conversions
results: Transformed organizational efficiency and student experience through strategic technology implementation and automation.
measurement: Real-time training data enabled for instructors
takeaway: Strategic technology implementation transforms operations. Automation and AI create scalable growth while improving user experience.

title: Pike Medical Consultants
subtitle: Integrated Digital Strategy & Campaign Management
bullets: Built PrimaryCare Indy and UrgentCare Indy websites
Managed Google Ads campaigns for patient acquisition
challenge: Medical practice group needed distinct digital presences for PrimaryCare and UrgentCare divisions while maintaining brand consistency and driving patient acquisition.
reasoning: Healthcare marketing requires trust-building across multiple touchpoints. Integrated strategy ensures consistent messaging while serving different patient needs.
execution: Built responsive WordPress websites for both divisions
Developed and managed targeted Google Ads campaigns
Created seasonal email campaigns (flu shots, allergy season)
Designed logos, banners, and marketing materials
Optimized patient-focused user experience across platforms
results: Established strong digital foundation for medical practice growth with cohesive branding and effective patient acquisition channels.
measurement: Built and refined two professional medical websites
Google Ads campaigns consistently driving patient traffic
Brand consistency across all patient touchpoints
takeaway: Healthcare marketing success requires integrated approach. Consistent branding across multiple channels builds patient trust and drives acquisition.
